name: Worker
uniques: Can transform to [Village Muster] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Ancient era]>
Can transform to [Plebeian] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Classical era]>
Can transform to [Rabble] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Medieval era]>
Can transform to [Levy] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Renaissance era]>
Can transform to [Militia] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Industrial era]>
Can transform to [Reservist] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Modern era]>
Can transform to [Conscript] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Atomic era]>
Can transform to [National Guard] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Information era]>
Can transform to [Border Warden] <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <during the [Future era]>
replacementTextForUniques:
Can transform to a mediocre militia fighting unit inside friendly land
Militia units lose fighting morale and HP while outside friendly land
A new militia unit is available in each era

name: Village Muster
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit
Heal this unit by [-60] HP <upon ending a turn in a [Foreign Land] tile>
